milestones.title: v0.2 Entity Model
milestones.description: v0.2 milestone: Entity model v2 refactor (types, store, routes, tools, UI), AI chat agent polish, multi-project architecture, UI design system. Foundation for dogfooding on real projects.
milestones.ai_prediction: Milestone completed Feb 8. Session 10 exceeded expectations â€” docs generation system fully operational, multi-user ready, rate limiting robust. Foundation for v0.3 is solid. Ready for Landmark dogfooding. Next milestone should focus on: (1) Landmark initialization + validation, (2) ISS-034 resolution (semantic watcher), (3) Cost optimization (ISS-043 prompt caching), (4) Tiered audit system (IDEA-055).
